description: This file defines REST API endpoints for assessment-related operations using FastAPI. It declares routes for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting assessments, integrating with a MongoDB backend via an AssessmentsService. The code sets up dependency injection for the service and provides detailed documentation for each route.

methods.name: get_assessments_service
methods.description: Provides an instance of AssessmentsService with a MongoDB database dependency, intended for dependency injection in FastAPI routes.

methods.name: list_assessments
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list assessments, with pagination support, returning a list response.

methods.name: get_assessment
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a single assessment by ID.

methods.name: create_assessment
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new assessment based on provided payload.

methods.name: update_assessment
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing assessment by ID.

methods.name: delete_assessment
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove an assessment by ID.
